title: CCM (Cloud Controller Manager) Service Chart Values Schema
description: Schema for validating values for the CCM service chart that manages cloud controller manager deployments

openstack-cloud-controller-manager.description: Configuration for the OpenStack Cloud Controller Manager

enabled.description: Enable or disable the OpenStack Cloud Controller Manager. Set to true to deploy the OpenStack Cloud Controller Manager in your Kubernetes cluster.

vsphere-cpi.description: Configuration for the vSphere Cloud Provider Interface (CPI)

enabled.description: Enable or disable the vSphere Cloud Provider Interface (CPI). Set to true to deploy the vSphere CPI in your Kubernetes cluster.

aws-cloud-controller-manager.description: Configuration for the AWS Cloud Controller Manager

enabled.description: Enable or disable the AWS Cloud Controller Manager. Set to true to deploy the AWS Cloud Controller Manager in your Kubernetes cluster.
